statements: UPDATE citizenship_laws SET compliance_status = FALSE WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE citizenship_laws SET law_description = 'New law description' , compliance_status = TRUE WHERE law_title = 'Immigration Law';
UPDATE citizenship_laws SET law_title = 'New Law Title', compliance_status = TRUE WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE citizenship_laws SET law_description = 'Updated Law Description', compliance_status = FALSE WHERE law_title = 'Immigration Act';
UPDATE citizenship_laws SET law_description = 'Updated law description' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE compliance_tracking SET law_compliance_date = '2022-09-15', compliance_officer = 'John Doe' WHERE tracking_id = 3;
UPDATE citizenship_laws SET compliance_status = TRUE, law_description = 'Updated law description' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE compliance_tracking SET law_compliance_date = '2023-05-15', compliance_officer = 'John Doe' WHERE tracking_id = 3
UPDATE Citizenship Laws SET legal_age = 21 WHERE country_name = 'USA';
UPDATE Citizenship Regulations SET compliance_date = '2022-12-31', regulation_details = 'Updated regulations for citizens' WHERE law_id = 3;
UPDATE Citizenship Laws SET legal_age = 21, citizenship_requirements = 'Proof of residency required' WHERE country_name = 'USA';
UPDATE Compliance Tracking SET compliance_status = 'Compliant' WHERE country_id = 1 AND law_id = 2;
UPDATE CitizenshipLaws SET law_description = 'New law description' WHERE citizenship_id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceTracking SET compliance_status = 'Pending' WHERE tracking_id = 2;
UPDATE ComplianceTracking SET compliance_status = 'Pending', compliance_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE tracking_id = 1;
UPDATE CitizenshipLaws SET law_description = 'New Law Description', law_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE citizenship_id = 2;
UPDATE Citizens SET country = 'USA' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Laws SET description = 'New description' WHERE title = 'Law XYZ';
UPDATE Citizens SET country = 'USA' WHERE citizen_id = 1;
UPDATE Laws SET title = 'Privacy Law Update', description = 'This law has been updated to include new privacy regulations.' WHERE law_id = 3;
